title: Orlando Figes on the transformation of Europe
itunes:title: Orlando Figes on the transformation of Europe
itunes:subtitle: Historian and author Orlando Figes talks about his latest book, The Europeans, which explores the cultural transformations of the 19th century through the lives of a remarkable menage a trois. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Orlando Figes describes the cultural transformations of 19th-century Europe through the lives of a remarkable menage a trois. Historyextra.com/podcast
